name: 64 CC Racer
description:
Note: Game may take some time to load on the first play.

Description

Race against the clock and try to get the fastest times in a variety of categories:

  • Fastest Lap (Any) — Cut corners, drive as recklessly as you want, even skip entire sections of the track if you wish! Just make sure you pass through each of the Sector checkpoints in order and your time will be recorded.
  • Fastest Lap (Complete) — Cut corners and drive recklessly, but don't stray beyond the crash barriers to skip sections and your lap time will be classified as Complete.
  • Fastest Lap (Crashless) — Cut corners and skip sections if you wish, just be careful not to beach your car or roll into an irrecoverable position. Finish a lap without pressing the Reset button and your lap time will be classified as Crashless.
  • Fastest Lap (Clean) — No more cutting corners! Stay on the track for the duration of the lap, without a tyre touching the terrain or your chassis hitting a crash barrier, and your lap time will be classified as Clean.
  • Fastest Lap (Perfect) — Adhere to all three of the above for an entire lap and your lap time will be recorded under the prestidgeous classficiation Perfect.
  • Fastest Sector 1/2/3 — To ensure a sector time is recorded you must drive that sector to Perfect standards and then complete the rest of the lap in whichever manner you desire.
Controls

Keyboard and all standard Controllers supported.

Keyboard:

  • WASD or arrow keys for driving and menu navigation
  • Space to apply the brakes
  • R to Reset your car to the last checkpoint
  • Esc to access pause menu
  • Enter to confirm menu choices

Controllers:

  • Triggers for acceleration
  • Left Stick for steering or menu navigation
  • Left Button on the Right Pad to apply the brakes
  • Select to Reset your car to the last checkpoint
  • Start to access pause menu
  • Directional Buttons for menu navigation
  • Bottom and Right Buttons on the Right Pad to confirm or go back on menus respectively
